Laurel & Hardy - Block Heads [1938] B/W & Colour version

With Love and Hisses [1927] short 21 min B/W

Slow-witted army private Cuthbert Hope (Laurel) manages to makes life
miserable for his gruff Top Sargeant Banner (Hardy). Banner must also
report back to firm Captain Bustle.

Starring: Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, James Finlayson, Anita Garvin

Should Married Men Go Home? [1928] short 20 min B/W

Ollie and his wife are enjoying a quiet Sunday at home until Stan shows up,
eager to play some golf. After Stan breaks the Hardys' Victrola and nearly
sets fire to their house, Mrs. Hardy chases the boys out..
